subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Papelbon fanned Alex Rodriguez in the eighth inning and struck out two in a scoreless ninth as the Red Sox prevailed behind a homer and three runs batted in from Manny Ramirez.
snippet: Jonathan Papelbon fanned Alex Rodriguez in the eighth inning and struck out two in a scoreless ninth as the Red Sox prevailed behind a homer and three runs batted in from Manny Ramirez.
